inbox.sql: select m.*,concat('',u.Login,'') as User, if(m.Subject='' or m.Subject is null,'$message[234];',m.Subject ) as Subject from ut_messages m left outer join ut_users u on u.UserID=m.UserID1 where UserID2=$auth->user; and m.Status<2 and Support<>1 and (m.TypeID='$folder;' or '$folder;'='') order by m.Date desc
inbox.action: delete from ut_messages where MessageID=@MessageID; and @delete;='on' and UserID2=$auth->user;
inbox.header:
<input type='checkbox' onclick='markall(checked)' >
    

<script>

function markall(checked)
{

    for(i=0;i<document.forms['inbox'].elements.length;i++)
    {
  	var item = document.forms['inbox'].elements[i];
	if(item.type =='checkbox') item.checked = checked;
    }
}

</script>

message.select: select m.*,u.Login,FROM_UNIXTIME(m.Date,'%d.%m.%Y %H:%i') as Date, concat('',u.Login,'') as User from ut_messages m left outer join ut_users u on u.UserID=m.UserID1 where MessageID='$id;' and (UserID2='$auth->user;' or UserID1='$auth->user;' or (Support>0 and '$support;'=1))
